thread.title: Ruthless Anti-Trump Signs Prove His Mom’s Home Country Hates Him The Most
thread.title_full: Ruthless Anti-Trump Signs Prove His Mom’s Home Country Hates Him The Most

author: John Haltiwanger
title: Ruthless Anti-Trump Signs Prove His Mom’s Home Country Hates Him The Most
text:
— Carolyn Scott (@TotallyCarolyn) January 30, 2017 “Donald Trump is a twat.” 
— Jamie Ross (@JamieRoss7) January 30, 2017 Scotland says “aye” to Muslims, but “naw” to Trump. 
— Alan Ferrier (@alanferrier) January 30, 2017 “Trumpty Numpty” has a nice ring to it. 
— James Rottger (@JamesRottger) January 30, 2017 “Trump’s heart is colder than Scotland.” She does not say this lightly. #ScotlandAgainstTrump pic.twitter.com/lcdurvorgS 
— Jamie Ross (@JamieRoss7) January 30, 2017 “Scotland hated Trump first.” 
— Peter Moonlight (@PeterMoonlight) January 30, 2017 “It’s a shite state of affairs.” Some very Scottish protesting pic.twitter.com/F5A7UG4m5W 
— Philip Dorward (@PhilDorward) January 30, 2017 Even the kids got involved! “He’s a big farty pants.” It’s very hard to disagree. Let's be honest. This is what May should have said to Trump #bigFartyPants #TrumpBan #ScotlandAgainstTrump pic.twitter.com/e0XluCKS2h 
— Clare Ferguson (@SaltireComic) January 30, 2017 Urban Dictionary translates “ roaster ” as “Scottish slang. Can be used to describe someone who is making a complete cunt of themselves.” 
— Severe Delays (@severedelays) January 30, 2017 Scotland clearly doesn’t mess around, especially when it comes to giving Donald Trump a piece of its mind. 
— Mairi McFadyen (@MJMcFadyen) January 30, 2017
